string-array.name: situation
string-array.item: (Choose a situation)
Your first date
Approaching a girl
Meeting your girlfriend\'s parents
Bump with your ex
Toilet chat
Old friend reunion
Family gathering
Riding a Gojek
Meeting the forgotten old friend

string-array.name: firstdate
string-array.item: What sort of vacations do you like to take?
How was your date ?
Tell me about your frieds?
Are you a dog person, a cat person, or neither?
What do you like to do in free time?
Is there anything you\'re really passionate about?
Do you like your job?
Are you a morning or a night person?
Would you like a bite of my dish?
Is it too noisy in here for you?
Who do you live with?
Are you close to your family?
Tell me who\'s in your family?
Is there anything you don\'t eat?
Do you collect anything ?
How do you feel about.. [thing you\'re really passionate about]?
Have you seen any good movies or TV shows lately?
Have you been to any good restaurants recently?
Are you dating anyone else at the moment?

string-array.name: approachgirl
string-array.item: How are you doing today?
How was your day today?
Did you do anything fun?
Beautiful day out today, isn\'t it?
Do you watch [Film]? Who is your favorite character?
Have you heard [Musician\'s] new album? What did you think?
Have you seen the latest [Film]? I heard it\'s fantastic!
I\'m dreading the math final next week. I suck at algebra! How are you feeling about it?
I\'ve heard you\'re good friends with [Your friend]. How do you two know each other?
Oh so you know [Your friend]? We go way back! He\'s hilarious, isn\'t he?
What are the top five places you want to visit before you die?
If you could be an animal, what type of animal would you be?

string-array.name: parent
string-array.item: Hello Mr. or Mrs. ! Nice to meet you
Thank you for your kindness ma\'am or sir
You look great today, Ma\'am or Sir
Is there anything [your partner] doesn\'t like?

string-array.name: ex
string-array.item: Hi, how are you?
How are your parents?
Do you still live there?
How\'s [her dog\'s name]?
Are you still going to [place you used to go to with her]?
You are still beautiful
How is your life going?
Say my hello to your mom please

string-array.name: toilet
string-array.item: Sorry, do you have any tissue?
Hmm, smells good
Nice fart, man
Let\'s find out who have the loudest fart
How long have you been there?
Sorry, when are you going to finish? I can\'t hold it any longer
OH NO! Someone didn\'t flush?

string-array.name: oldfriendreunion
string-array.item: Hey, how are you?
What are you doing these days?
What are the best things you did after graduation?
How is your family?
Do you remember that awesome teacher? How is she now?
remember the song we always listened to together?
Have you heard anything about [friend who\'s long gone]?
Remember when you [your friend\'s embarrassing moment]?
Wow! you look different
Dou you have children?
What happened to your hair?
LOL! You gained weight
Do you remember the smartest child in our class?
How is your study now?
Are you still doing your hobby?
Are you married?
How are your plans next 5 years?
Remember that hot girl we always talked about?
Have yo gone to any places outside the country?
How about your crush back then? Are you still in contact with her?

string-array.name: gojek
string-array.item: Sorry for waiting too long
Which way is the best way?
How is the traffic today?
Where do you live, Sir?
So gojek is your only job?
How is the weather throughout the day?
Sir, do you know why is it so hard to order Gojek lately?
Do you have a family?
Look! the sky is beautiful
There are many Gojek drivers who have cool bike
What do you think about the relationship between Gojek and conventional ojek now?
How long have you been a driver?
Does this job really give you huge profit?

string-array.name: forgottenfriend
string-array.item: Oh, Hai! (be excited)
Long time no see!
How about your best friend back then?
Oh, let me give you my business card! (hoping they give you theirs)
Where do you live now?
I can\'t remember when we last met, it feels like a long tome ago
